thread.section_title: Arbor City Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: well surprised
thread.title_full: well surprised - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Peter B
title: well surprised
text:
Booked this hotel very cheaply direct on Trip Advisor and was worried about it even though the prices after were quite high. Well, it was really good. Upgraded to an Executive room with breakfast for Â£74/night. An absolute bargain. Reception were superb, breakfast was very good, location -well I liked it close to Aldgate East and the bottom of Brick Lane. Room was very good with ample room, warm, very quiet. I would go here again.
The only thing I could not get away with was the regular knock from the pipes, drip or whatever. However I have told them of this and hopefully they fix it before we go back.
